description:
The fourth prince of the Kingdom of Analeit. His name in his previous life was Shunsuke Yamada. He was a textbook example of the average high school student and retains that quality after reincarnating. However, he has a deep admiration for his older brother Julius, the hero, and spends every day working hard to catch up to him.
Source: Official page
name: Schlain Zagan Analeit
